pokemons.name: Poison Hammer
pokemons.description: Hammer infused with posion gem magic.

pokemons.name: Sun Shield
pokemons.description: Shield passed down the by tribe of Ancients.

pokemons.name: Crystal Sword
pokemons.description: Sharp sword the can cut through armour.

pokemons.name: Summoning Book
pokemons.description: Summon the undead to aid in battle.

pokemons.name: Healing Crystal
pokemons.description: Makes the owner immune to poison.

pokemons.name: Healing Herbs
pokemons.description: Restores user back to full health.

pokemons.name: Exploding Gem
pokemons.description: Throw at the ground to explode.

pokemons.name: Mysterious Key
pokemons.description: Opens a chest sealed by darkness.

pokemons.name: Golden Rock
pokemons.description: Used to trade with the mountain dwarves.
